Package com.xebisco.yield

Class SimpleRenderable

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.YldB
com.xebisco.yield.Component
com.xebisco.yield.SimpleRenderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonFillShape, TileMap
public class SimpleRenderable extends Component
It renders the entity with a rotation and a color

    • isForceAngle

      public boolean isForceAngle()
      Returns whether the angle of the vector will override the entity angle.
      Returns:
      The value of the forceAngle variable.

    • setForceAngle

      public void setForceAngle(boolean forceAngle)
      Sets if the angle of the vector will override the entity angle.
      Parameters:
      forceAngle - If true, the angle of the force will be the same as the angle of the object. If false, the angle of the force will be the angle of the object plus the angle variable.

    • setAngle

      Parameters:

    • setIgnoreViewPosition

      public void setIgnoreViewPosition(boolean ignoreViewPosition)
      Sets whether the view position should be ignored when rendering.
      Parameters:
      ignoreViewPosition - If true, the render position will not be affected by the view position.
